SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE ((FROM_ID = ? AND TO_ID = ?) OR (FROM_ID = ? AND TO_ID = ?)) AND CHAT_NO > (SELECT MAX(CHAT_NO) - ? FROM CHAT) ORDER BY CHAT_DATE
INSERT INTO CHAT VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE ((FROM_ID = ? AND TO_ID = ?) OR (FROM_ID = ? AND TO_ID = ?)) ORDER BY CHAT_DATE

SELECT CHAT_NO, FROM_ID, CONTENT, CHAT_DATE FROM CHAT WHERE (FROM_ID, CHAT_DATE) IN ( SELECT FROM_ID, MAX(CHAT_DATE) AS MAX_DATE FROM CHAT GROUP BY FROM_ID ) AND FROM_ID != 'ADMIN' ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC
